hero.heading: Explore UK's Geospatial World
hero.subheading: With the Ordnance Survey's STAC Portal, locate, and manage spatial and temporal imagery assets with ease.
hero.buttonText: Log in to OS STAC Portal

block: Our STAC Portal provides a scalable, spatio-temporal catalogue of imagery data (including earth observation, aerial photography and height data) that is easily searchable and discoverable. This STAC Portal will enable the Ordnance Survey to better manage and provide access to their imagery data resources.

cards.title: Explore STAC Collections
cards.description: Discover a multitude of spatio-temporal assets from various sources. Navigate through different collections and find the data that fits your requirements.

cards.title: STAC API
cards.description: Access our STAC API to search and download geospatial data programmatically. Our API integrates seamlessly with a range of mapping software.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.subheading: For any queries about the OS STAC Portal, please contact:
